document_data.name: Dathantar's Crawl
document_data.refs: {{Cite web/theedverse/2021-11-14 - Some Unlabeled North Ward Roads}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Dathantar's Crawl''' was an alleyway of hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]]<ref name=CoS.M"> in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].Across the editions this street went unlabeled on maps of Waterdeep. It was only revealed by [[Ed Greenwood]] on Twitter on November 14{{th}}, 2021.
document_data.Location: This curving alley ran north off of the [[Beaconmarch]], cut through [[Selvur Alley]], and terminated in a dead-end.
document_data.History: Dathantar's Crawl was named for [[Dathantar]], a famous [[nightsoil wagon]] operator in the 1200s [[DR]] whose wagon was said to "crawl" along the street, as Dathantar often stopped at home to eat and left the stench of the [[nightsoil]] in his wagon to linger.
